articles.content:
Microsoft warned today of ongoing human-operated ransomware campaigns targeting healthcare organizations and critical services, and shared tips on how to block new breaches by patching vulnerable internet-facing systems.

articles.author: Jason Murdock
articles.title: Google's AI Health Screening Tool Claimed 90 Percent Accuracy, but Failed to Deliver in Real World Tests - Newsweek
articles.description: Google said its AI showed a "specialist-level accuracy" of more than 90 percent for the detection of referable cases of diabetic retinopathy (DR). In reality, it quickly faced unforeseen challenges.
articles.content:
A team of Google researchers is going back to the drawing board after an artificial intelligence-based health care project fell short of expectations.
